info.title: m2-digital Api
info.description:
M2 Digital - WEB - Backend test. Created some items like Contracts, Factories, Seeders, Dependency Injection, Docker, MySql and Swagger in Laravel 8.

Develped by Rafael Lessa de Castro Xavier
